title: 10 Years On, 298 Victims Of MH17 Disaster Still Await Justice
content: The world reacted with horror 10 years ago when Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 was shot down over war-torn eastern Ukraine as it flew from Amsterdam to Kuala Lumpur.

title: US Singer's "Rehab" Post After "Drunk" Performance Of National Anthem

title: Why Food In Space Falls Flat - The Surprising Connection To Gravity

title: "Bizarre Reason" Why No Sniper Was On Roof Where Trump Shooter Was Hiding

title: Sikh Republican Faces Backlash After Leading Prayers At Party Convention
content: Sikh Republican Harmeet Dhillon delivered a prayer at the Republican National Convention (RNC).Ms Dhillon, a religious-liberty lawyer and former Trump campaign adviser, told the Milwaukee audience that she comes from a family of Sikh immigrants.
